title: Identifying a, $$b$$, and c
text: What are the values of a, $$b$$, and c in the given quadratic equation $$x^2+x+2=0$$?

title: Setup the Quadratic Formula
text: The quadratic formula is $$x=\frac{\left(-b\pm \sqrt{b^2-4a c}\right)}{2a}$$. Try plugging in the values of a, $$b$$, and c into the formula.

title: Calculating the Discriminant
text: What is the result of $$b^2-4a c$$ using $$a=1$$, $$b=1$$, and $$c=2$$?
